medical_history.chief_complaint: Late-onset adrenal insufficiency and mid-shaft hypospadias in a 46,XY patient.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with mid-shaft hypospadias and cryptorchidism at birth and began experiencing episodes of weakness, dizziness, and vomiting at the age of 9 years. Severe weakness, vomiting, and seizures were reported at age 10 years and 4 months, leading to an admission where serum sodium was critically low.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Bilateral cryptorchidism, mid-shaft hypospadias, history of surgeries at 1 year and 2 years 7 months for talipes, hypospadias, and cryptorchidism. Episodes of adrenal failure symptoms starting at age 9.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents are heterozygous carriers for the CYP11A1 mutation; no other specific family medical history related to this condition is provided.
